name: Netta Barzilai
description: '''Netta Barzilai''' ({{langx|he|נטע ברזילי}}, {{ipa|he|ˈneta baʁziˈlaj|}}; born 22 January 1993), also known mononymously as '''Netta''', is an Israeli singer. After winning [[Israel in the Eurovision Song Contest 2018#HaKokhav HaBa L'Eurovizion|the fifth season]] of ''[[HaKokhav HaBa]]'', she earned the right to represent her country at the [[Eurovision Song Contest 2018]]. On 12 May 2018, she won the contest, held in [[Lisbon]], with her song "[[Toy (song)|Toy]]", marking [[Israel in the Eurovision Song Contest 2018|Israel]]'s fourth win in the Eurovision Song Contest (after [[Eurovision Song Contest 1978|1978]], [[Eurovision Song Contest 1979|1979]], and [[Eurovision Song Contest 1998|1998]]).
